sk1.name: Fatal Bonds
sk1.desc: Binds several enemy units together, causing %damage_share_percentage%%% of the damage dealt to one of them to be felt by the others.

sk2.name: Shadow Word
sk2.desc: Demnok whispers an incantation, healing a friendly unit or damaging an enemy unit over time.

sk3.name: Upheaval
sk3.desc: CHANNELED - A powerful slowing current that grows stronger as it's channelled. Lasts up to 16 seconds, slowing enemies up to 84%%. Enemies are slowed for 3 seconds after leaving the area or the spell ends.

sk4.name: Chaotic Offering
sk4.desc: Summons a Golem from the depths, stunning enemies for one second. The Golem lives 60 seconds, takes reduced damage from spells, has Permanent Immolation and Flaming Fists on attack.Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
